title: 820-3332 Eternal apple
message:
This board starts to load OS X but never finish to do it. Eternal apple
I noted that somebody touched the bios yet, so I am afraid this board has no clean ME. If I dont have backup, it is possible to create a good working dump for this board or eternal Apple is not bios problem.

title: 820-3332 Eternal apple
message: Upload dump and tell me what the serial number on the bottom is.

title: 820-3332 Eternal apple
message: Customer sent me only the board and told me that he has only the board. Generic dump will work for test?

title: 820-3332 Eternal apple
message: No, do as I asked. Also you need a full machine to test this board as it needs a touchpad/battery/IO board to boot correctly. Stop accepting board only repairs as they are only going to cause time wasting.
